Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Expands the definition of veteran to include members of the United States public health service
Summary: Expands the definition of veteran to include members of the United States public health service to provide such members with access to the same benefits as members of the United States armed forces.
LawCode: Amd §§606, 1511 & 210-B, Tax L; amd §§350, 364, 369-b & 369-h, Exec L; amd §210, Ec Dev L, amd §63, Pub Off L; amd §§458, 458-a & 458-b, RPT L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, the executive law, the economic development law, the public officers law and the real property tax law, in relation to expanding the definition of veteran to include members of the United States public health service
